id.title: Id
id.description: The human-friendly ID of the Source

embedding_config.description: The embedding configuration used by the source.

embedding_endpoint_type.title: Embedding Endpoint Type
embedding_endpoint_type.description: The endpoint type for the model.

embedding_endpoint.title: Embedding Endpoint
embedding_endpoint.description: The endpoint for the model (`None` if local).

embedding_chunk_size.title: Embedding Chunk Size
embedding_chunk_size.description: The chunk size of the embedding.

handle.title: Handle
handle.description: The handle for this config, in the format provider/model-name.

azure_endpoint.title: Azure Endpoint
azure_endpoint.description: The Azure endpoint for the model.

azure_version.title: Azure Version
azure_version.description: The Azure version for the model.

azure_deployment.title: Azure Deployment
azure_deployment.description: The Azure deployment for the model.

embedding_config.title: EmbeddingConfig

created_by_id.title: Created By Id
created_by_id.description: The id of the user that made this Tool.

last_updated_by_id.title: Last Updated By Id
last_updated_by_id.description: The id of the user that made this Tool.

created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: The timestamp when the source was created.

updated_at.title: Updated At
updated_at.description: The timestamp when the source was last updated.

title: Source
description:
Representation of a source, which is a collection of files and passages.

Parameters:
    id (str): The ID of the source
    name (str): The name of the source.
    embedding_config (EmbeddingConfig): The embedding configuration used by the source.
    user_id (str): The ID of the user that created the source.
    metadata (dict): Metadata associated with the source.
    description (str): The description of the source.
